query: query TvSeriesCriticReviews($tvSeriesId: Long!, $criticReviewsLimit: Int = 10) { tvSeries(id: $tvSeriesId) { id criticReviews(limit: $criticReviewsLimit) { items { id text type author { firstName lastName __typename } source { title icon { avatarsUrl fallbackUrl __typename } __typename } __typename } total __typename } __typename } }
